effect.@en: After successfully casting, a foe must Resist with a Toughness Test, or else suffer [[/roll 1D10]]+[WB] Peril. Depending on how many steps down they move negatively, you move an equal number of steps up the Peril Condition Track positively.

criticalSuccess.@en: The foe is paralyzed in place for one minute, left Helpless.

criticalFailure.@en: The ring crumbles to dust, as you suffer [[/roll 2D10]]+[WB] Peril and are left Helpless for one minute. The foe moves up an equal number of steps on the Peril Condition Track positively.

reagents.@en: A ring of antinomy, worn upon the ring finger.

system.distance: Any one person you can clearly see
